title: Complete project proposal
description: Draft and finalize the project proposal for upcoming presentation.

title: Prepare slides for team meeting
description: Create slides covering progress, challenges, and next steps for the team meeting.

title: Review code changes
description: Review and provide feedback on recent code changes submitted by team members.

title: Send status report to stakeholders
description: Compile and send a status report to project stakeholders outlining current progress and upcoming tasks.

title: Schedule client meeting
description: Coordinate with the client to schedule a meeting to discuss project requirements and updates.
